name: 2 rabbits
description:
2 rabbits is a retro style action game. Your object is to lead two rabbits and defeat the enemies.
The pink rabbit follows the white rabbit. Only the pink rabbit can defeat the enemy.
As the game progresses for a while, the background and music will change.

If would like to support my works, please consider backing me on patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/pigmhall
